description: One soldier is detained after a massive manhunt following the attack at an airbase near Voronezh.
title: Three Russian soldiers killed in shooting on base near Voronezh
title_page: Three Russian soldiers killed in shooting on base near Voronezh - BBC News
maintext: One unidentified source told the Interfax news agency that the shooting started when an altercation broke out during an inspection, but this account has been denied by military officials.
